short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay up to date with the bounties available on your Twitch Bounty Board

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Coco aims to help Twitch content creators by keeping them up to date with the bounties available on their Bounty Board.

---

Useful links:
- Source code: https://github.com/seldszar/coco
- Bugs & suggestions : https://github.com/seldszar/coco/issues
- Release notes: https://github.com/seldszar/coco/releases

---

Coco is a free extension that does not collect or sell personal user data.
Donations, although optional but greatly appreciated, help support my work and encourage me to offer the best quality products possible.

- PayPal : https://go.seldszar.fr/paypal
- Coinbase : https://go.seldszar.fr/coinbase

Thank you for your support!
